programme.title: Smighty Jam
programme.desc: Nardy doesnt believe he will ever be a good athlete, but Zap teaches him to trust his instincts and use Smighty Basketball skills to stop the villains from stealing the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: The Zoo Trip
programme.desc: Chaos unfolds as Chottu Mottu Lambu Don and Colonel decide to make a trip to the zoo. Starting from feeding the animals, from sneaking into the control room and opening the enclosures and racing crocodiles, they mess it all.

programme.title: The Rolling Rice Ball
programme.desc: WI-Go drops one of his rice balls in a rat hole and gets a handful of jewelry in return. Meanwhile, a greedy neighbor next door UGo hears the news.

programme.title: Final Attack
programme.desc: The Guardians fall out with each other and start training separately. But that very day, Negu decides to send out ALL his mutants at the same time. Xia and Pai are captured and April has to descend to the Chou World to free them. By working as a team and using the mutants’ weaknesses against them, they finally defeat them all.

programme.title: Wild Pitch
programme.desc: It’s an ordinary bat and ordinary balls but the game is sure extraordinary. Watch Colonel battle with cascading red balls, while Don easily triumphs this game until Chottu Mottu and Lambu come up with a plan B.

programme.title: Game On
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: A Fishy Chase
programme.desc: Something is fishy in the air! Its Don’s new pet, a Goldfish. Charly Marly and Lary are drooling in hopes of feasting it, but not till Don is there to rescue it.

programme.title: Where is it?
programme.desc: During a game of hide and seek Deedee and Nino come across a panicky Mewmew who cannot locate his key. Deedee creates a spell to get back all of Mewmew’s missing things and in come his key, including his long lost bubble-cordion and pocket fork. But Mewmew doesn’t want those things back as he had already replaced them. So Deedee offers to keep them as she couldn’t stand the sight of them being thrown away. On the way they find Charlie hiding from his lost but newly found alarm clock that is chasing him. The clock won’t let Charlie sleep a bit by ringing all the time, so Deedee offers to take it along with the rest. Deedee gets many more additions to her lost and found group as many more citizens of Abra-Dabra are affected with lost things. But as Deedee doesn’t have any space to store them, she puts up a give-away store. Now everyone’s happy.

programme.title: Sneezils
programme.desc: When Sneevil creates the Sneezils flu, all the Smighties get infected, except for Zip who has to take care of them while defending the Castle from Villains.

programme.title: Field Trip Fiasco
programme.desc: The bros set out for a trip to the great Qutab Minar. And they make sure that they got rid of the rat trio before entering. But Larry Charly and Marly are way too smarter than any of us. To make matters worse, they bombard the entire structure and put the blame on Don and Colonel. Will they ever escape this??

programme.title: DOG DANGER
programme.desc: Practicing her Warrior Transformation, April gets stuck as a panther. Using a newly discovered elevator, Negu sends a big Mutant Dog up to chase April’s cat. Pai and Xia manage to train the dog, having it fetch Pai’s stick and rewarding it with delicious mushrooms.

programme.title: BirthDay Party
programme.desc: Its GrandPAs birthday and Keet and Cat are given the task of decorating the house while Dunky is planning to make a nice cake for the evening party.

programme.title: GIVEAWAY
programme.desc: The Elders assign lots of chores to the Guardians. To get them to mellow out, Pai prepares a special dish. They become so mellow they start giving away all their possessions. Seeing an opportunity, Negu sends his henchmen to ask for the Glove of the North. Koto and Amkko fail, so Negu sends Mei and the Mutant Raccoon in disguise. The Mutant Raccoon ends up smashing himself in the face with the nunchucks given to Pai by the Elders.

programme.title: Smighty Frighty
programme.desc: In this Halloween-themed story, Sneevil and Biggs get the scare of the lifetime when the Spooky Smighties decide to teach them a lesson in the middle of Fright Forest.

programme.title: CAN I KEEP HER PLEASE?
programme.desc: Buzz finds a strange seed and tenderly nurtures it. The seed sprouts and blossoms into a healthy, baby plant he names Ruby. As Ruby grows, she eats more and more healthy food and becomes very large and aggressive towards the other Creepy Candy TM. Ty-Poe suggests that Ruby be moved to a different environment out in nature. Will Buzz let her go, will she go peacefully, will the other Creepy CandyTM be eaten? Watch the funny and action packed episode to find out what happens.

programme.title: Colour Chaos
programme.desc: Mayor De Pfeffel can’t decide what colour to paint the town hall as it is so dull and grey. So Deedee offers to help, without magic this time, by getting a town vote as to which colour is liked best. Deedee and Nino go ahead and do just that, asking each and everybody they see in Abra-Dabra and noting their choice of colours. Boris and Sandy are confused so set out to paint and decide, but end up messing up the wall. They seek the help of Deedee, who is all so ready to help. But Nino is scared things will get worse with the powerful magic spell, and with good reason. The spell not only “cleaned” Charlie’s wall but made grey stripes on the walls of every house in Abra-Dabra! Even Tiggy’s yellow house is all grey!! So Deedee and everybody else pitch in and paint every house back to its original colour. So the final building standing is the town hall, but no one has sufficient pain for any one colour. So they finally decide to paint it with every colour they have, like a rainbow!

programme.title: Ghost Attack
programme.desc: Its Friday the 13th. Cat is watching a late night horror movie and all creeped out when it ends…a perfect opportunity for Keet to get even.

programme.title: Count it out
programme.desc: Hey kids! Sway and listen to popular #nurseryrhymes like count it out #123Song, Easter bunny, rain and many more with our pink diva Emmie the elephant! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats! These rhymes are best during kids playing time!

programme.title: THE SAND WITCH
programme.desc: The Clean Bee has stolen all the sand from the beach to build herself a massive and very clean hive-castle.

programme.title: FLYING TEA
programme.desc: The food inspector in in the hotel for an inspection. Juicy jalebis are being fried in the shop and a housefly comes to munch on them. Food inspector is angry and says a fly is a big NO NO. Chai Raja looks at Sundar angrily. Sundar whacks the fly with his towel and throws him out. The defeated fly sadly flies out of the shop, only to be seen by Basha who inspires him, teams up with him and decide to attack the teashop. The duo wreaks havoc in the teashop with tea flying all over the place and jalebis getting thrown all over and the customers going mad with the menacing fly. And the food inspector is visiting again and again to check the cleanliness. Chai Raja is going crazy and he knows that this is all due to Sundars fault. And now poor Sundar has two enemies Basha and the fly! Plus the strict food inspector! Oh o!!!

programme.title: Meet Zoonicorn Ene
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: The Bear and the Honey Jar
programme.desc: Dunky has just scolded Cat from trying to steal the cookies jar ,he then packs the lid on a big honey jar and places it on the kitchen shelf next to the cookie jar and warns Cat from stealing anything. .

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Gummy, Harry and Kala head off to a scary Halloween costume party – but the winner of the ‘Best Costume’ prize.... isn’t wearing a costume, and is actually a real monster!

programme.title: Smighty Claus
programme.desc: Sneevil dresses up like Smighty Claus to ruin Smighty Christmas. Can Melody and the rest of the Super Six stop him before he steals all the presents in Smightyland.

programme.title: Who Ate it?
programme.desc: There’s one last donut in the house – and 3 hungry donut lovers... each one of them determined that no one (other than them) gets it!

programme.title: Adventure Park
programme.desc: Its a nice evening and Dunky takes Keet to the nearby park . well Cat is just around the bushes to get Keet.

programme.title: Three Little Pigs
programme.desc: Three little pigs decide to leave home and live separately for their own good. Little pigs each build a house to live in until a wolf makes an appearance.

programme.title: Frozen Smighty Day
programme.desc: The Super Six are enjoying Frozen Smighty Day until Monster Birds threaten Smightyland. Its up to Dude and Melody to work together to get Nardys Freeze Ray back from Sneevils underground lair.

programme.title: Show Time
programme.desc: We start the show with a close up of the remote the camera pulls out to see Keet picking the remote and starts watching the last episode of “ Bigger boss” a reality show on TV.

programme.title: Ski Trip Fun!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are on a vacation, skiing in Shimla. You think the trio would leave them alone?? Hell no!! Romance blossoms in the snow and the rats make sure that Don and Colonel turn against each other. And they have a great time watching them fight.

programme.title: Merry Go Bush
programme.desc: Pancake isn’t taking care of his new pet fish appropriately, even though he’s trying super-hard. When he arrives in the Zoonivese and tries to help Ene take care of a Merry-Go-Bush, he learns to that there’s a right way, and a wrong way, to care for something (by following the rules), no matter the good intentions

programme.title: The gift
programme.desc: Yo, Yo, Ragoo and the young boy Theo are invited to Pandora, the princess’s party. Theo’s allergic to peanuts, but, not knowing, Pandora’s made a peanut butter cake for him.

programme.title: No rain, no gain
programme.desc: The twins meet Imelda, a very anxious lizard. Because she can see a small cloud in the blue sky, Imelda is preparing to face a hurricane. Perhaps you can think positive and consider that a bit of rain is good for someone else.

programme.title: Rowdy Cloudy
programme.desc: When Pancake angers a cloud by not listening, the livid cumulus vents its anger by taking Pancake on a wild ride, storming all over the Zooniverse. An apology, when sincere, can help make things right.

programme.title: Hopeless Dreams
programme.desc: Cat is taking a cat nap as Keet flies in and bangs a pan on Cats head and wakes him up. Cat gets up in a start and amazed by what he sees.

programme.title: Playmates
programme.desc: A peaceful day. Don is watering his plants and suddenly the water stops. He jerks the hose, pokes a stick into it, but doesn’t realize that it’s the mice who are causing this water explosion! Don has to take revenge, and this time he sits on his couch with a bunch of fire crackers! Will he set the house on fire?

programme.title: Airborne
programme.desc: Task for the day: Building a plane. Spanners, bolts and wrenches fly in the air as Don gives instructions to Colonel on building a plane.

programme.title: Plastic Bottle
programme.desc: Watch Hepi an Briko transform plastic bottles to something out of this world. Literally.

programme.title: Runaway Custard
programme.desc: Tiggy is busy making custard and Deedee and Nino are helping out. But Mayor De Pfeffle cannot seem to understand what happened to his purple custard freshly sent over by Nino. So Mewmew offers to help while taking eggs over to Tiggy’s. But the carton turns out to only have one egg, and Tiggy needs to make eight more jars of purple custard. The answer seems to lie in Deedee’s magic spell that makes one purple custard jar never run out of purple custard for the entire day. And it works like a charm, non-stop purple custard. The Mayor gets a half eaten jar of purple custard and keeps it safe for after, only to have it finished by the Doobydoos. As the Mayor turns up at Tiggy’s once more for more purple custard, he rushes off with the jar that the spell has been cast on. A happy Mayor gets Mewmew to stay guard of the jar while he is out, and Mewmew catches the Doobydoos red handed trying to eat the custard. But the jar tips over in the confusion and unknown to Mewmew the loyal custard guard, the bottle keeps on flowing till it reaches the ground floor. Deedee is called in urgency and only Nino can fly up the building and put the jar right up again. Having done that they call all the townsfolk to come to town hall to eat up as much purple custard as they can. All join in and have a hearty treat, so much so that they cannot have a bite more. Finally Mayor De Pfeffle arrives and is happy to share his purple custard with everyone, but much to his surprise no one wants any. Wonder why?

programme.title: Makeup Whose Mind
programme.desc: When Odessa can’t decide which Zoonicorn stuffy to take with her on a weekend trip, she ends up having a competition in the Zooniverse between the real Zoonicorns to see who to choose. It’s not whether you win or lose, but how you play the game.

programme.title: A Rodent Fix
programme.desc: Don has a new and yummy kitchen garden. And a new thief too! For the first time, don and the rats join hands to catch the unwanted intruder. And it is indeed a veggie mess all around.

programme.title: Mouse Chase
programme.desc: A small mouse is very scared and just escaped from Hoodie and his gang to now hide in the house. Well from the pan into the fire as he realizes that Cat is worst then Hoodie.

programme.title: Misadventure
programme.desc: The painter inside Don has woken and he must have his painting on the wall. But the rats are ready even to turn the world upside down to stop Don from fulfilling his dream. And you can imagine what will follow. But whatever happens in between, it is all a sweet happy ending.

programme.title: Rat Control
programme.desc: It looks like don has come to terms with Charly, Marly and Larry ; and that is not it, they are now friends!!! Colonel just cannot stand this atrocity. He is hiring experts after experts to destroy the rats. And at last the right person comes for the job. Will he succeed..?? You wish!!!!!!

programme.title: Library Trouble
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are in the library. And the library has rules – of silence and composure. But with the rats trying their level best to irritate don, the library is as noisy and dirty as a market place in no time!!

programme.title: Shopping Mad
programme.desc: Its shopping time! Don and Colonel move the trolley up the aisles, little do they know that the three mice are peeping from between Don’s bag. Chaos unfolds in the mall!

programme.title: Car Trouble
programme.desc: Colonel buys a brand new car and brings it to show off to his bro Don. But Larry Marly and Charly would just not let it happen. The dog bros put their lives in danger to save the shiny four wheeler. But alas! All that is left of the car is its crumpled skeleton. Thank God the rats spared their lives!

programme.title: BORROWED GLOVE
programme.desc: When Xia finds he’s surprisingly bad at archery, he borrows the Glove of the North and becomes a great archer. Negu sends The Archer, a mutant, to challenge Xia to a contest. The stakes? The Glove of the North!

programme.title: The Fly.
programme.desc: A pesky fly won’t leave Gummy alone, and ends up driving him increasingly nuts in his escalating obsession to get rid of it.

programme.title: Python Problem
programme.desc: Don is trimming the hedge and humming to himself and guess what slithers out from between the bush. A python. And this is no ordinary python, he can beat up Colonel, drive a truck with its tail, stay alive in the fridge and lots more.

programme.title: Three Little Pigs
programme.desc: Three little pigs decide to leave home and live separately for their own good. Little pigs each build a house to live in until a wolf makes an appearance.

programme.title: The show off
programme.desc: the twins meet a lizard and a chameleon who are playing hide and seek. The chameleon prides itself on being the best hide and seek player in the world. By doing so, he wakes up the cranky dinosaur...

programme.title: There's no place like home
programme.desc: The twins meet a lizard who doesn’t like the place where she lives and is convinced that other animals are luckier than her. When they help her settle in the “perfect” place, the lizard realizes what she’d be missing if she left home.

programme.title: Palooza
programme.desc: The Twins help an old tortoise deal with a loud party that’s been keeping him awake.

programme.title: The Princess Of The Lake – Swan Lake
programme.desc: THE PRINCESS OF THE LAKE – SWAN LAKE

programme.title: The Outlawed Cat - Puss In Boots
programme.desc: Sandra and her assistant FO travel into the tale of PUSS IN BOOTS, having been called by the cat. His master, the MARQUIS OF CARABAS, is about to be judged for the theft of a valuable necklace belonging to his fiancée, the PRINCESS. SANDRA and FO must find the necklace and discover the real culprit before the trial ends.

programme.title: The Red Button
programme.desc: Fred insists Brains let him watch over her lab while she visits her father’s Space Station. She agrees under one rule: “Don’t press the red button.” The entire time she’s gone, he can think of nothing else.

programme.title: Tooth Trouble
programme.desc: Zips got a bad toothache and is too afraid to go to the dentist. The Super Six decide to help by showing her how easy it is; however, their new dentist looks an awful lot like Sneevil who uses laughing gas to make the Smighties powerless. Zip has to face the dentist to rescue her friends.

programme.title: Distemper Tantrum
programme.desc: Maple has difficulty learning to float in the Zooniverse. Be persistent and you can learn to stay calm by thinking happy thoughts.

programme.title: Adventure Park
programme.desc: Its a nice evening and Dunky takes Keet to the nearby park . well Cat is just around the bushes to get Keet.

programme.title: BUDDY SYSTEM
programme.desc: Xia rejects April’s advice on a fighting move, accepting the identical advice from Pai. Maestra Saku says today they’ll study using the Buddy System. Xia’s paired with Saku and has to knit while April and Pai learn much more exciting lessons in the forest. But the knitting lessons pay off when Xia uses his new skills to rescue April and Pai from a giant mutant spider. Xia learns females give excellent advice on fighting!

programme.title: The Vegetarians
programme.desc: We start the episode with Cat holding an upset stomach and at doctors place with Dunky and Keet. The doctor tells him he cannot have non veg and should be on a veg diet.

programme.title: Space-whale
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Snoring
programme.desc: Granny Peters’ loud snoring winds up keeping Gummy, Harry and Kala awake – and trying whatever schemes they can think of to somehow stop it!

programme.title: Treeto-Man
programme.desc: Treeto secretly wishes to be a superhero. He tells Duda his dream, but says he could never be a hero in real life. Duda disagrees, and wants to help him become one. Duda creates several intentional "emergency" situations that require Treetos help. Unfortunately, someone else beats him to it every time and ruins Dudas plans. Duda tries one last time to make Treeto the hero. However, the false emergency becomes a real one. Although everyone tries hard to prevent a terrible accident, in the end it is Treeto who saves the day. Surprisingly, the friends discover that Treeto has been the real hero behind the scenes all along.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time Part 2
programme.desc: After accidentally landing Aladdin in jail, Jamillah comes up with a brilliant plan to break him out. Dressed as a guard, Jamillah approaches the cell and confidently tells the dozy guard that he is dismissed. Her confidence confuses him and she and Genie get Aladdin out. Aladdin cant believe he has a genie and races off shouting joyfully to all of Baghdad.

programme.title: Water, Water Every Where
programme.desc: GrandPA takes the trio for a small ride to the nearby towns newly opened mini waterpark. Cat is all excited and is wearing water goggles and a snorkeling gear.

programme.title: Tiggy’s Big Feast
programme.desc: Tiggy is all flustered and confused as he’s not prepared, nor has any idea what to make for a surprise lunch he promised Mayor De Pfeffel. Seems Deedee’s magic is the only answer. The spell she conjures makes Tiggy be totally decided on the recipe that he sees first. And when the spell is cast, the recipe book opens up exactly at the recipe of a pie made of Tika Pila flowers. The problem is that only the Doobydoos can pick the Tika Pila flowers as it grows in the most prickly cacti in Abra-Dabra! But no matter how much Deedee and Nino coax Tiggy to work on another recipe; Tiggy is totally fixated on the Tika Pila flower pie. Though the Doobydoos love eating the flowers, they are too scared of the loud and angry Tika Pila monster that guards them and rush off in a hurry. They finally hit a bargain with Tiggy in exchange for a hundred custard sandwiches. Only with much reassuring and coaxing they pick every Tika Pila flower around. Mayor De Pfeffel is already at Tiggy’s and really hungry. But one Doobydoo is too ambitious and stays back to pick the last Tika Pila flower, but that awakes the Tika Pila monster and he shouts the biggest shout ever, scaring Tiggy and making the pie fly up high and splatter down on his face! The inevitable terrible has happened and there is nothing to give the Mayor. Just then when things couldn’t get any worse Mayor De Pfeffel lunges inside and is happy to see a whole plate of his favourite custard sandwiches.

programme.title: Mango Season
programme.desc: It’s the mango season and Dunky has to guard all the mangoes so that no one will steal them. He has taken the help of Cat and Keet to guard them from Hoodie and the mean cat gang.

programme.title: The Egg
programme.desc: Gummy wakes up with a mysterious egg in his bedroom – and, over Harry’s objections, becomes convinced that it’s ‘Junior’, a future soccer star!

programme.title: Muffin Delight
programme.desc: GrandPA is out of town and Dunky is really up and grooming himself in the mirror and cleaning the house. He has made a special gajar ka halwa but quickly hides it from Keet and Cat.

programme.title: Swimming Class
programme.desc: Dunky wants to learn swimming so goes to the lake with a tyre tube with Keet who is helping looking at the swimming manual to tell him how to swim.

programme.title: SWITCHING PLACES
programme.desc: After arguing about whose avatar is more difficult to control, Xia and April swap magic accessories. Xia becomes the Panther Warrior and April becomes the Dragon Warrior. Unfortunately, just as they’re struggling to control each other’s avatars, Negu’s latest mutant attacks: his beloved pet “cat,” Kanna. The Guardians manage to capture Kanna, so Mei, Koto, and Amkko race to the Yan World to retrieve her – which is just what the Guardians want!

programme.title: Tidy Up Time
programme.desc: Deedee almost falls on her bottom, if not for Nino’s timely save, by tripping on a big red ball in her courtyard. It looks like the twins are having a playing spree but are not careful in keeping things back where they belong. Charlie can’t stand the mess any more that he posts Sandy and Boris with the chore of tidying up the entire place before he gets back from his postman duties that day. Charlie furthers the chore by cautioning them that any toys that are not kept back in their rightful places will be given away, to which the twins sadly agree. But more than tidying, the twins set out messing up what Deedee and Nino are patiently helping them with. The twins neither want Uncle Charlie to give away any of their toys nor are they able to clean it up soon enough. It seems only Deedee’s magic can help them, much to the dismay of Nino. Not only do all the toys magically shut themselves in the toy chest, all of them are nowhere to be seen when Sandy peeps in. The spell seems to have been too strong that it made the toys clear away from the home of the twins and fall in different places all over Abra-Dabra, in Tiggy’s cooking pot, inside Mayor De Pfeffle’s shoe, in Mewmew’s garden, in the front yard of the Doobydoos, and everywhere else. They all set out to get the toys back for the twins but the toy zebra and the toy frog are nowhere to be seen. Finally they find them with the Doobydoos who think the toys belong to them. So Boris and Sandy decide to give them other toys in exchange for Dr Frog and Zuzu. Uncle Charlie returns to see the twins happily play with their most favourite toys and appreciates them for making the home sparkling clean.

programme.title: CHICKEN!
programme.desc: To earn his Orange Underbelt, Pai thinks he’s going to fight Xia in a chicken costume. But he ends up having to fight Negu’s giant chicken mutant, which can fire toxic eggs!

programme.title: The Easter Episode
programme.desc: Wheres the Easter Bunny? And what are chocolate bunny eggs? Gummy and Friends are about to find out

programme.title: Charlie’s Castle
programme.desc: It’s Uncle Charlie’s birthday and the twins have surprised him with a nap mask and breakfast, but the twins want to celebrate a little more by throwing a party and inviting all their friends. Although Charlie wishes to have a more peaceful celebration, he gives in to the pleas of Boris and Sandy. After getting a hint from Charlie on how much he loves chess, boris and sandy plan the birthday party around a ‘knights and castles’ theme. The twins get Deedee to bring balloons, a castle cake with turrets from Tiggy and a jousting dance from Mewmew. Boris and Sandy set out to decorate Uncle Charlie’s house, just in time for their friends coming in with all the goodies for the party. They even invent a balloon jousting game between Deedee and Mewmew that makes Mewmew crash into Tiggy’s cake and thereby wreck all the arrangements much to the dismay of the twins. This calls for Deedee’s magic where all the party ingredients are put into a large purple cauldron and it makes a gigantic bouncing castle in the chequerboard garden. And the snoring sounds lead them to find Uncle Charlie napping right inside it. They bounce around Uncle Charlie as much as they can and then wind down for a long snooze. Uncle Charlie awakes to happily find that the twins have organised his most best birthday slumber party ever.

programme.title: La vida es buena
programme.desc: Sveta descubre la infidelidad y decide vengarse. Su amiga la ayuda, pero las cosas no salen según lo planeado

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?"

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7
programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: Incredible Tales Sr 7

Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Felix in Fairyland-1923
programme.desc: Felix is reading a book about Fairyland, and decides that it must be a wonderful place to be. Suddenly he hears a cry for help, and finds a fly stuck on a piece of flypaper. He rescues the insect, only to have it turn into a beautiful fairy princess who, in gratitude for his help, grants him one wish. He wishes he were in Fairyland, and is immediately transported there.

programme.title: The Crystal Brawl 1957
programme.desc: Bluto muscles out Popeye to take Olive to the fair. Popeye rushes ahead and poses as a fortune teller, luring Olive in. He shows Olive her future (actually, her past) in the crystal ball: first, a clip of a mountain climbing sequence that culminates in Bluto assaulting Olive. Then, a clip from another amusement park showing strongman Bluto stealing Olive away to a roller-coaster while Popeye rings a strength-testing bell repeatedly. Olive, having seen this, no longer wants anything to do with Bluto and walks out. Bluto exposes Popeye and chases Olive into a Tunnel of Love; Popeye follows and trashes Bluto.

programme.title: Space Transformer 1985
programme.desc: Using new technology, a crew consisting of Captain Chi, Nancy, and the robots Baipam and Diatron 5, is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into Ivy's body in order to defeat the invaders. programme.title: Popeye's 20th Anniversary 1954

When called on to make a speech, he instead shows clips from two of his movies. Bluto does a slow burn through this, finally stuffing Popeye's trophy onto Popeye's head - but the trophy is full of spinach, so Popeye clobbers Bluto.

programme.title: Noah's Ark 1959
programme.desc: Noah gets the word: build an ark in seven days. His sons cut the necessary trees in three days, and much furious sawing and hammering follows. But there's no rest, as they need to round up all the animals. Noah boards the animals, then his sons, their wives, and his wife (who packed a ferocious picnic). The rains and flood begin. The animals soon develop cabin fever and get restless, but Mrs. Noah has the answer: "Music has charms to soothe the savage beast." His sons find instruments and begin playing; everyone dances. But Harry the hippo dances with everyone but his wife; Noah goes to her, and while she tells him not to mention Harry's name, Noah convinces her that Harry is thinking only of her. The rains end; Noah sends a dove out who brings back an olive branch. They land on Mount Ararat and disembark.

programme.title: The Jack Benny Christmas Show 1961
programme.desc: In The Jack Benny Christmas Show, holiday cheer meets classic comedy as Jack Benny brings his trademark wit to a festive television special. Joined by his regular cast and surprise guests, Benny’s dry humor and perfectly timed gags light up the season with laughter. Blending sketches, music, and holiday spirit, this variety show captures the warmth and fun of Christmas in true Jack Benny style.

programme.title: Scrooge 1932
programme.desc: In Scrooge, Seymour Hicks brings Charles Dickens’ immortal Ebenezer Scrooge to life in one of the earliest sound versions of A Christmas Carol. On a cold Christmas Eve, the miserly Scrooge is visited by the ghost of his late partner, Jacob Marley, and three spirits who reveal the shadows of his past, present, and future. Faced with his own greed and the suffering it causes, Scrooge must choose between a lonely grave and redemption. Atmospheric and faithful to Dickens’ classic tale, this 1932 adaptation delivers timeless holiday magic and a powerful message of compassion.

programme.title: The Miracle on 34th St 1955
programme.desc: In The Miracle on 34th Street, a kindly old man hired to play Santa Claus at Macy’s insists that he is the real Kris Kringle. As his warmth and generosity touch everyone around him, skeptics take him to court to prove his claim. Blending holiday charm, heartfelt performances, and a timeless message about faith and belief, this television adaptation of the classic story reminds audiences that sometimes the greatest miracles are the ones we choose to believe in.

programme.title: The Great Commandment 1939
programme.desc: In The Great Commandment, a stirring tale of faith and sacrifice unfolds in the days of Roman-occupied Judea. When young Joel defies his father’s wishes and joins the Zealots in their fight against tyranny, he soon encounters a teacher whose message of love and forgiveness changes his path forever. Blending history, drama, and spiritual awakening, this powerful film explores the struggle between violence and compassion—and the timeless call to live by the greatest commandment of all.

programme.title: Candyland "The Bon Bon Parade" 1935
programme.desc: In The Bon Bon Parade, Walter Lantz delivers a sweet animated fantasy where candy comes to life in a whimsical parade of music and color. Chocolate soldiers march, peppermint sticks dance, and bonbons whirl in a dazzling display of imagination. With playful gags, lively animation, and a sugar-sprinkled sense of fun, this short film serves up a delightful treat for audiences young and old.

programme.title: Santa Claus Conquers the Martians 1964
programme.desc: In Santa Claus Conquers the Martians, holiday cheer goes interplanetary when Martians, desperate to bring joy to their children, kidnap Santa and whisk him away to the Red Planet. With the help of two Earth kids and his boundless Christmas spirit, Santa turns the tables on his captors and spreads laughter across the galaxy. Campy, colorful, and brimming with 1960s sci-fi charm, this cult favorite delivers a cosmic dose of yuletide fun.

programme.desc: Pat Morgan and Ted Kord are rival newspaper reporters always trying to outscoop each other. They join together to solve a series of murders being committed in an apartment building.

programme.desc: California born and raised surfer, Mitchell Goosen has to spend six months in Ohio while learning the hard way- love is where the heart is.

programme.title: China 9, Liberty 37 (1978)
programme.desc: In China 9, Liberty 37, Fabio Testi stars as a condemned gunfighter offered freedom if he kills an aging rancher (Warren Oates). But when he meets his intended victim—and falls for the rancher’s restless wife (Jenny Agutter)—the deal turns deadly. Torn between passion, loyalty, and survival, the three are swept into a violent showdown where betrayal and desire collide. With raw emotion, striking landscapes, and gritty shootouts, this revisionist Western blurs the line between love and vengeance.

programme.title: One Dollar Too Many 1968
programme.desc: In One Dollar Too Many, three schemers—played by Antonio Sabàto, John Saxon, and Frank Wolff—race each other across the frontier in a madcap chase for stolen loot. Double-crosses, disguises, and comic chaos pile up as each man tries to outwit the others, with greed proving to be the wildest outlaw of all. A playful twist on the Spaghetti Western, this action-packed romp mixes gunfights with sharp humor and larger-than-life characters.

En su búsqueda de los terroristas, Quan se ve atrapado en un juego del gato y el ratón con un político irlandés que colabora con el gobierno británico (Pierce Brosnan), cuyo pasado podría tener algo que ver con los asesinos.

programme.title: Guest Christina Mancuso
programme.desc:
Find out WHY cheaters cheat in relationships! This week, Nessa and Katrina B sit down with licensed psychotherapist Christna Mancuso to explore the different facets of therapy and how it can be beneficial for everyone - whether they think they need it or not! Together they explore the fascinating dynamics between people and their families, marriage, dating and sex, friendships, coworkers, jobs, and even food.
Also, do you think you have a NARCISSIST in your life? Tune in to find out how to identify them and deal with them! And then finally, learn some useful tips along with Katrina B and she confronts her own issues with procrastination.
This episode is full of useful tidbits that we all can take in to examine our own lives. You don’t want to miss this one!

programme.title: The Demon's Child
programme.desc: In search for her missing sister, a young woman takes a job as a nurse to a young boy in a coma and hunts for clues in his sinister family home...

programme.title: Goatman
programme.desc: A news reporter and her crew investigating the legend of "Goatman" in a dense forest find themselves in danger, getting a bigger story than any of them could imagine...

programme.title: Demonic Plastic Surgeon, MD
programme.desc: At an elderly peoples home, a demonic plastic surgeon has been summoned. And soon, they will all be due a make over...

programme.title: Alfredo
programme.desc: Brendan Cobbs, un famoso novelista, es enviado a una remota cabaña de la Inglaterra rural en busca de inspiración para su próxima novela. Cree haber encontrado su próximo tema cuando se encuentra con Alfred, un muñeco del tamaño de un niño que puede cobrar vida. Pero surgen consecuencias mortales cuando Brendan se da cuenta de que Alfred tiene intención de matar.

programme.title: Hotel Dinosaurio
programme.desc: Sienna está desesperada por ganar un gran premio en metálico en un concurso secreto clandestino, pero los dinosaurios comienzan a cazarla para entretenimiento de los ricos y adinerados. ¿Podrá ser la última en sobrevivir a la horrible noche para ganar el premio?

programme.title: Kecksburg
programme.desc: Un reportero investiga un misterioso accidente y descubre algo más que un objeto, sino una enorme conspiración gubernamental. Inspirada en los hechos reales del 9 de diciembre de 1965 y en uno de los incidentes OVNI más misteriosos de Estados Unidos...

programme.title: El Ultimo Cartucho
programme.desc: Dos hermanos pistoleros enemigos de las injusticias se reúnen una vez más para salvar una tribu de nativos americanos a los cuales les quieren quitar sus tierras y despojarlos de todas sus pertenencias.

programme.title: Calladas Por La Mafia
programme.desc: Un grupo de mujeres son secuestradas y son retenidas ala fuerza y una casería toma dimensiones inesperadas logran escapar del infierno y cobran venganza contra ellos.

programme.title: El Hormigón
programme.desc: El hormigón es un superhéroe que está harto de la mafia de su ciudad y decide combatirla con ayuda del Karate y la salsa.

programme.title: Al Acecho del Leopardo AKA Madrid- México
programme.desc: Durante un viaje por la selva mexicana, tres amigos, Román, Patricia y Lorena son testigos de una matanza de campesinos indígenas. Román graba en vídeo la masacre. El Suavecito, el jefe de los asesinos, se da cuenta y mata a Román y a Patricia. Aprovechando la confusión del tiroteo, Lorena logra escapar con la cámara y el vídeo. En su huida se encuentra con un grupo de enanitos toreros que la llevan hasta la ciudad de México. El Suavecito, que no quiere dejar testigos, la persigue implacablemente hasta una enorme plaza de toros, donde en una danza de la muerte, se escenificará la batalla entre el bien y el mal.

programme.title: Aquel Septiembre
programme.desc: En "Septiembre" la vida de Antonio se ve sacudida con el regreso de Carolina, su mejor amigo a quien no ve desde hace 6 años. Esta vez sus planes cambian, el amor comienza a juega con su corazón mientras Julián le hace descubrir los celos que nunca pensó encontraría. Carolina encuentra en Antonio a su mejor confidente y desahogo, sin sabiendo el daño que le hace al decirle todo lo que siente por Julián y hablando con él sobre su confusión por enamorarse de un amigo. Y es que pobre Antonio está enamorado de Carolina, su mejor amiga.

programme.title: Entre Brujas y Nahuales
programme.desc: En la ciudad de Tulancingo Hidalgo, Acatlán y San Dionicio la gente anda muy asustada, pues se rumora que están ocurriendo sucesos fuera de lo normal, tal como desaparición de niños de quienes se han encontrado cuerpos sin sangre, dicen que son las brujas, porque han visto bolas de fuego que aparecen y desaparecen, pero nadie sabe la verdad lo que esta pasando y existe mucho miedo en la población de la región.

programme.title: El Juego del Sexo
programme.desc: Un alienígena cambiante procedente del espacio exterior causa estragos en un pequeño pueblo rural del suroeste de Estados Unidos, cerca del legendario Área 51 de fama ovni. Estos extraterrestres son una raza devoradora de cerebros a quienes les encanta decapitar y comerse a los humanos. Están entre nosotros y lo han estado durante millones de años.

programme.title: El Duende
programme.desc: Rosalía se muda a la ciudad junto a su hijo pequeño, Ramiro. Con la ayuda de una conocida, consigue encontrar vivienda. La casa ha estado cerrada por décadas, y tiene un horno antiguo. Lo que Rosalía ignora es que dentro del horno habita un duende que tiene por costumbre robar niños.
